Presentation

Class HtmlConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Presentation.HtmlConverter

  • public class HtmlConverter
extends Object
    This class is used to make methods which can be used to eaisly be able to make java code work with html. And its better code wise to make the java as little as possible shown in the presentation layer. that is why this method has been made, to take care of that part without having java code on the JSP pages.
    Author:
    emils, ahmed, Frederikke, frederik

      HtmlConverter()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String carportAnlgeRooftoHtml(Carport carport)
      This method creates a string which has html code that displays a flaat roof carport with the values lenght, width, shed lenght, shed width and angle.
      static String carportFlatRooftoHtml(Carport carport)
      This method creates a string which has html code that displays a flaat roof carport with the values lenght, width, shed lenght, shed width and angle.
      static String generateOrdersHTML(ArrayList<Order> orders)
      This method creates a string with html code that displays a order of the carport from the inserted carport.
      static String printMetalPartList(ArrayList<MetalParts> list)
      This method creates a string which has html code that displays a material list for that wood parts of the carport, it shows in a table format a list of all the metal parts needed to make a carport.
      static String printPartList(ArrayList<MaterialList> list)
      This method creates a string which has html code that displays a material list for that wood parts of the carport, it shows in a table format a list of all the wood parts needed to make a carport.
      static String showLoggedInUser(User user)
      This method creates a string with hmtl code which displays the information of the user from the inserted paramter.

    • Method Detail

      • carportFlatRooftoHtml

        public static String carportFlatRooftoHtml(Carport carport)
        This method creates a string which has html code that displays a flaat roof carport with the values lenght, width, shed lenght, shed width and angle.
        Parameters:
        carport - a instance of the Carport class (a custom class)
        Returns:
        a string with HTML code for displaying a carport.

      • carportAnlgeRooftoHtml

        public static String carportAnlgeRooftoHtml(Carport carport)
        This method creates a string which has html code that displays a flaat roof carport with the values lenght, width, shed lenght, shed width and angle.
        Parameters:
        carport - a instance of the Carport class (a custom class)
        Returns:
        a string with HTML code for displaying a carport.

      • printPartList

        public static String printPartList(ArrayList<MaterialList> list)
        This method creates a string which has html code that displays a material list for that wood parts of the carport, it shows in a table format a list of all the wood parts needed to make a carport.
        Parameters:
        list - a arraylist of the MaterialList class (a custom class)
        Returns:
        a string html code for a table with wood carport parts.

      • printMetalPartList

        public static String printMetalPartList(ArrayList<MetalParts> list)
        This method creates a string which has html code that displays a material list for that wood parts of the carport, it shows in a table format a list of all the metal parts needed to make a carport.
        Parameters:
        list - a arraylist of the metalparts (a custom class)
        Returns:
        a string html code for a table with metal carport parts.

      • generateOrdersHTML

        public static String generateOrdersHTML(ArrayList<Order> orders)
        This method creates a string with html code that displays a order of the carport from the inserted carport.
        Parameters:
        orders - : is a arraylist of the Order class
        Returns:
        a string html code for displaying a order.

      • showLoggedInUser

        public static String showLoggedInUser(User user)
        This method creates a string with hmtl code which displays the information of the user from the inserted paramter.
        Parameters:
        user - a instance of the User class (a custom class)
        Returns:
        String with HTML code.
